thread.title: Obama Reverses Himself on Afghanistan Troop Pullout; Will Leave 5,500 U.S. Troops into 2017 – Video 10/14/15 | Tea Party
thread.title_full: Obama Reverses Himself on Afghanistan Troop Pullout; Will Leave 5,500 U.S. Troops into 2017 – Video 10/14/15 | Tea Party

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Obama Reverses Himself on Afghanistan Troop Pullout; Will Leave 5,500 U.S. Troops into 2017 – Video 10/14/15 | Tea Party
text:
(Before It's News)
President Obama announced yesterday he is reversing himself on pulling all U.S. Troops out of Afghanistan. He will leave 9,800 Troops in Afghanistan through most of 2016, and 5,500 Troops into 2017.
This is a tacit admission by Obama that he blew it in Iraq. He pulled all U.S. Troops out of Iraq – against the advice of Military Leaders, and just about every Conservative in America – and it allowed ISIS to explode onto the scene. Obama will never openly admit he blew it, but this Afghanistan decision is clear indication he knows if he doesn’t leave a residual force in the country, it will be overrun by the Taliban and by ISIS.
